blog.name: angelofberlin2000
blog.title: Like a Rose trampled on the ground
blog.description:
In addition to the pain and the exhaustion, he recalled how waiting on the cross between takes became tedious. To fight the boredom, he listened to music on headphones. One particular song called "Above All" (Like a Rose ...) by Michael W. Smith helped him through his most difficult moments.

"It arrived when I was confused and angry. I didn't think I could go on. The song described how Jesus was rejected and alone. That thought took me to a place — it opened an interior door that held me while on the cross," an emotional Caviezel explained. "The experience of feeling rejected and alone as all those around me laughed while drinking their hot coffees, oblivious to what was occurring. Jesus must have felt like this — forsaken, rejected, alone, and despised. It helped me pray in a very deep way — to pray without words, to pray from the heart. The discomfort, the loneliness, the split shoulder, the raw flesh all forced me into the arms of God because I had nowhere else to go for a performance I knew I was unable to create."
Jim Caviezel, Shamelessly Catholic

blog.name: unabashedkeanufan
blog.title: keanu days & nights
blog.description: a loving ode to keanu reeves

summary: I love Keanu, I adore him and he is such a great guy and a great human being. He’s special. It’s hard to explain someone,...
body:
I love Keanu, I adore him and he is such a great guy and a great human being. He’s special. It’s hard to explain someone, especially someone like him because he is beyond words. He is such an interesting and lovely person. He is kind beyond kind, generous beyond generous. He really supported me to play her; he really was my partner in this dance, in this movie, and our friendship developed over the course of these years and it really moves me.

- Carrie-Anne Moss, Tribute Canada (November 20, 2003)

summary: HOW RIVER PHOENIX TOOK METHOD ACTING TO A WHOLE NEW LEVEL His advisers hid the script from him. River’s agent, Iris Burton,...
caption:
HOW RIVER PHOENIX TOOK METHOD ACTING TO A WHOLE NEW LEVEL

His advisers hid the script from him. River’s agent, Iris Burton, thought the script for MOPI was awful, and never stopped trying to get him refuse the project. She tried hiding the script from him, throwing multiple copies of it in the garbage. “I never like that fucking My Own Private Idaho, it should have stayed in the trash where it belonged.” His parents thought the role of a gay and drug addicted prostitute was too raw and inappropriate and would not serve his image well. The famous rumor of Keanu Reeves driving cross-country on a motorcycle to deliver the script is false, River and Keanu made a pact to do the film only if they were both in it. They both understood the script, and against the industries advice, they decided to trust director Gus Van Sant.

He lived like a street kid. The young cast resided at Van Sant’s Portland house. They bonded by living in such close quarters, sleeping on mattresses on the floor. “The many young actors, stand-ins, and helpers literally took over Gus Van Sant’s house. He had to temporarily move out for more quiet and less distractions.” They would stay up all night talking, playing music, drinking, and doing drugs. Real hustlers told River their life stories and tales from the job. They also taught him how to pick up men for sex, one time almost going through with with it until it was time for River to get in the car.

He drew on his own pain and experience on the road. The cinematographer for River’s previous film Dogfight said, “He invited the demons of the role into himself. The street urchin character in Idaho stayed with him and played into the whole drug thing.” River was ready to plan a character that lived on the edges of society, similarly to when him and his family were homeless and busking on the street. The isolation and search for belonging was something he could relate to. River commented, “Idaho is so much of my soul given to the world, the memories of my childhood lost on the road, with no place to go and nothing to hold on to.”

He proudly took the role of an explicit gay character. In 1991 playing a gay role whose affections are shown through sex and emotion was taboo. River knew this, and commented in an interview “Do you think anyone would have taken this script ten years ago?” In fact, not many people were willing to take the role then either. River also rewrote the confessional campfire scene with Keanu, making it clear that Mike was gay and in love, instead of keeping it ambiguous like Van Sant wanted.

He did a lot of method acting for his role as a narcoleptic. River called himself someone with “chameleon qualities” and became the role of Mike Waters. Him and Keanu had a lot of pressure on them since Van Sant chose them over real street hustlers. RIver also learned from Van Sant’s narcoleptic friend Jake how to go into sleeping spells properly. He would do it randomly throughout the day to practice. A magazine reporter found him sleeping in an odd position and wrote, “River has given himself over completely to his narcoleptic alter ego. Visitors to the set are told not to approach him, in observance of his method concentration.”

The role greatly affected his drug use and mental health. The method acting and research inclined River to to be intoxicated regularly. Living in Van Sant’s house, he would drink and take drugs like heroin and cocaine. Often the one to clean up his scandals, Iris Burton said, “River was fine until he did Gus Van Sant’s fucking movie. I blame him for all of this… It all started on the set of MOPI. The drinking started there. Nobody is going to tell me differently.” Burton was told River got into a drunk driving incident the first week of filming (the company took his car from him after that). River’s friends and family knew that once the shoot ended he had changed, and developed a deeper drug dependency along with his costars.

summary: Angelina Jolie pode estar namorando o ator Keanu Reeves desde 2017, diz site. A atriz já foi alvo de muitas especulações sobre...
title: Angelina Jolie pode estar namorando o ator Keanu Reeves desde 2017, diz site. A atriz já foi alvo de muitas especulações sobre sua vida amorosa
body:
Angelina Jolie pode estar namorando o ator Keanu Reeves desde 2017, diz site. A atriz já foi alvo de muitas especulações sobre sua vida amorosa

Angelina Jolie pode estar apaixonada. Segundo a revista australiana NW , a atriz que já foi alvo de muitas especulações, pode estar namorando o ator Keanu Reeves . O romance teria iniciado após uma viagem secreta dos dois para uma ilha grega.

Angelina Jolie e Reeves podem estar juntos desde o meio do ano passado e teriam iniciado o namoro durante uma viagem secreta para uma ilha grega. Os…

View On WordPress
